name: Wolf Pack: Third Edition
description:
The third edition of Wolf Pack by Los Pingüinos Perdidos.

Grab up to three friends and hunt in the night as a pack of wolves!
Choose between four locations to catch your prey. Cooperate to corner elk and buffalo and have your fill for the night.

Playable in browser here:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projec...

Made for the RemakeJam hosted by Kevin Wong

First two editions of Wolf Pack here:
Original:
https://dboyfajardo.itch.io/wo...
Second Edition:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projec...
